title: Just like you
creator_credit: Eugene Osborne Smith and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: Society is made up of all sorts of people who share common hopes and dreams. Each person should be able to advance according to ability. However, the difference between people create conflicts and barriers that hinder the success of some. A montage of photographs accompanied by the poem ‘Just Like You’ presents these concepts.
